data.text: We're delighted to announce the latest addition to the Hyperledger project family: Hyperledger Web3j! ü•â Contributed by Web3 Labs to the Hyperledger Foundation in January 2024, Hyperledger Web3j brings with it a wealth of experience and a vibrant community eager to join the Hyperledger ecosystem. ‚ùî So, what exactly is Hyperledger Web3j? üìö Hyperledger Web3j serves as the Java and Android integration library for Ethereum. Developed in 2016 by Web3 Labs founder, Conor Svensson, this project was born out of the need for enterprise developers to seamlessly navigate Ethereum-compatible blockchains. üëâ Find out more here: https://lnkd.in/gEBaDNjp #HyperledgerWeb3j #opensource #blockchain #Web3j #Ethereum #android #java
